duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care, ensuring safety and wellbeing in a fast-paced medical unit environment.
Manage and oversee the insertion, care, and maintenance of various lines and devices for patient treatment.
Demonstrate proficiency in airway management and related medical-surgical/oncology skills, ensuring optimal patient care.
Utilize critical thinking to administer medications, perform treatments, and address patient needs in adherence to care protocols.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to deliver comprehensive care for patients with acute medical/surgical needs.
Maintain accurate documentation of patient records, medication administration, and treatment plans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher in Nursing
